body: <white>Your songs lose their tempo as your body calms itself.
<white>You no longer enjoy the grace of the gods.
<white>Your tone shifts as it picks up speed.
<white>Your songs lose their tempo as your body calms itself.
<#e5e5e5>You seed good fortune and fate with the elaborate chords of your tune.
<white>Sheryni is now one of your enemies.
<white>The shrunken head in your inventory sneezes violently.
<#e5e5e5>Light weaves itself within your free hand, forming a sharp anelace that you grip tightly.
<#e5e5e5>An onyx and garnet ring glimmers faintly, the gemstone upon it aiding you.
<white>Your music already produces discord in those who listen.
<white>Your music already produces discord in those who listen.
<white>The flow of destiny favours you as your song ends with a single strident note.
<white>You have recovered balance on all limbs.
<white>Your fingers begin to trail with light.
<white>You have recovered balance on all limbs.
<white>You cease to wield a sharp anelace in your right hand, securing it conveniently on a black leather weaponbelt of the wolf of cloaking.

<white><#ffff00>>>> <white>qeb stand;;parry head;;coldread Sheryni;;sing song of Awakening
<white>You will now attempt to parry attacks to your head.

<#cdcd00><#00cdcd>A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. <white>An austerely-armored massive black scorpion awaits its rider nearby. <#00ffff>Sheryni is here. She wields Enigma, the Edge of Reason in her hands.<white>
<white>RExits<#cd00cd>You see exits leading COLOR #800080SEND HREF="north"north/SEND/COLOR and COLOR #800080SEND HREF="west"west/SEND/COLOR./RExits
<white><#cdcd00>You perform a cold read of Sheryni:
<#e5e5e5>With a snap of your fingers, three illusionary globes rise up from the ground and begin to spin around Sheryni.
<white>An onyx and garnet ring glimmers faintly, the gem absorbing the fatigue completely.
<white><#cdcd00>You perform a cold read of Sheryni:
<#e5e5e5>With a flourish, a circle of glowing runes begins to form around Sheryni, gently spinning around her in a pattern.
<#e5e5e5>An onyx and garnet ring glimmers faintly, the gemstone upon it aiding you.
<white>You suddenly perceive the vague outline of an aura of rebounding around Sheryni.
<white>When you can act: stand;;coldread Sheryni;;quickwield left 279483;;pierce Sheryni
<white><#cdcd00>You perform a cold read of Sheryni:
<white>You fluidly swap a sweeping, polished falchion with a sweeping, polished falchion in your left hand.
<#e5e5e5>You raze Sheryni's aura of rebounding with a sweeping, polished falchion.
<white>Sheryni takes a long drag off her pipe filled with reishi.
<white>With a final, flourishing note, your powerful song awakens the inner emotions of those around you.
<white>Sheryni gazes at you in awe, lost in a windfall of emotional awakening.
<#e5e5e5>With a flick of her wrist, Sheryni splatters some of her adhesive toxin upon you.
<#e5e5e5>An oily, irritating toxin smears along your flesh, coating you with latent peril.
<white>When you can act: stand;;coldread Sheryni;;sing song of Decadence
<white>You have recovered balance on all limbs.
<white><#cdcd00>You perform a cold read of Sheryni:
<#cdcd00>The strength of her sadness is at 0%.
<#cdcd00>The strength of her happiness is at 0%.
<#cdcd00>The strength of her surprise is at 0%.
<#cdcd00>The strength of her anger is at 0%.
<#cdcd00>The strength of her stress is at 0%.
<#cdcd00>The strength of her fear is at 0%.
<#cdcd00>The strength of her disgust is at 0%.
<#e5e5e5>Swaying to the exotic paean filling your soul, you pair a sultry tone with an upbeat rhythm, nigh-purring the euphony as the first come-hither notes trickle past your lips.
<white>A spine-laden eviscerator's vicious claws scythe into you, inflicting injuries most grievous with its bellicose grace.
<white>The injury shreds your tendons, rendering your movements clumsy.
<white>A screeching throatripper rakes brutal incisions across your face as it darts past you.
<white>Your flesh is left disfigured and unrecognisable.
<white>Your sheath glimmers into view and absorbs the blow.
<white>A look of extreme focus crosses the face of Sheryni.
<white>Thank the Gods! Your clumsiness has been cured.
<white>You take a long drag off your pipe filled with yarrow.
<white>You no longer will inspire disloyalty among friends.
<white>You remove 1 decongestant, bringing the total in the cache to 1128.
<white>Sheryni presses a mending poultice against her skin, rubbing the poultice into her flesh.
<#e5e5e5>With a flick of her wrist, Sheryni splatters some of her paralytic toxin upon you.
<#e5e5e5>An oily, irritating toxin smears along your flesh, coating you with latent peril.
<#e5e5e5>Sheryni produces a handful of ignition agent and flings it at you, casting fulgent sparks throughout your surroundings.
<#e5e5e5>The toxin upon your flesh sizzles and pops as it catches flame.
<#e5e5e5>Sheryni bounds forward, her ringblade arcing outward to lash against you.
<#e5e5e5>A prickly stinging overwhelms your body, fading away into numbness.
<white>An alacritous pilferer slithers up your body in a skitter of limbs and observes your face.
<white>When you can act: stand;;coldread Sheryni;;hiltblow Sheryni
<white><#cdcd00>You perform a cold read of Sheryni:
<#cdcd00>The strength of her sadness is at 2%.
<#cdcd00>The strength of her happiness is at 3%.
<#cdcd00>The strength of her surprise is at 0%.
<#cdcd00>The strength of her anger is at 0%.
<#cdcd00>The strength of her stress is at 0%.
<#cdcd00>The strength of her fear is at 0%.
<#cdcd00>The strength of her disgust is at 0%.
<#e5e5e5>You spin backward and slam the hilt of a sweeping, polished falchion into Sheryni's stomach.
<#e5e5e5>Sheryni's stomach gurgles miserably under the blow.
<white>Your fingers begin to trail with light.
<white>Sheryni touches a tree of life tattoo.
<white>You discern that Sheryni has cured the effects of clumsiness.
<white>The paresis numbing your body intensifies, fully paralyzing your muscles.
<white>Your muscles unlock; you are no longer paralysed.
<white>You remove 1 opiate, bringing the total in the cache to 872.
<white>You have set the 'rebounding' defence to the 11 priority.
<#e5e5e5>Sheryni whirls towards you, her ringblade's keen edge cutting open a ragged wound.
<#e5e5e5>A prickly stinging overwhelms your body, fading away into numbness.
<white>You take a long drag off your pipe filled with reishi.
<white>You take a drink of an elixir of health from a Wheel of Fates vial.
<#e5e5e5>Sheryni's acrobatic footwork carry over to your opposite side as she hews into you with her ringblade.
<white>There is a tightening sensation in your lungs suddenly.

<#e5e5e5>Twisting your body, you dodge the attack.

<#e5e5e5>Taking a small pellet within your hand, you quickly fling it towards Sheryni, which bursts into disorienting sound.
<white>Your tantalizing song coils around your audience with the hedonistic slink of silk, concluding with a single velvety note lingering in the ether.
<white>You sense that your decadent song has affected Sheryni.

<#e5e5e5>Drawing your hands apart, you shape light into a robust iron collar that forms around the neck of Sheryni.

<white>A horrific murder descends upon you amidst myriad screeches, disturbing your footing and balance.
<#e5e5e5>Sheryni thrusts both arms out and slams Enigma, the Edge of Reason into your throat in hopes of stifling you.
<white>You feel the bone in your throat crack underneath the blow's stifling force.
<white>You have recovered balance on all limbs.

<#e5e5e5>Sheryni turns Enigma, the Edge of Reason towards you, and the blade begins its ominous work, its pull reaching for your elemental core and latching onto your shadow essence, drawing it into the blade as you remain powerless to resist it.
<#e5e5e5>You feel your ring drawing venom from your body.

<#e5e5e5>Beads of cold sweat begin to form on your brow as the last wisps of shadow are drawn inexorably into Enigma, the Edge of Reason, leaving you a mere shell devoid of darkness. Finally, Sheryni steps forward and ends your suffering with a swift cut of her darkness-empowered blade to your neck.
<#e5e5e5>You were afflicted by asthma, heartflutter, and disfigurement.
<white>An alacritous pilferer skitters down your leg on its way back to the ground.
